alert.note: Alert for Finney; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kearny and west central Finney Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Lakin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deerfield, Garden City and Holcomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
